text: mariyu emi? Oka maranincina vyaktini (avisvasini), memu sajivuniga (visvasiga) cesi jyotini prasadincaga! Danito prajala madhya sancaristunnavadu mariyu andhakaranlo (avisvasanlo) cikkukoni, vati nundi bayataku rajalanivadu iddaru samanula? Ide vidhanga satyatiraskarulaku, varu cestunna karmalu, maroharamainaviga ceyabaddayi
